comments.body: Or maybe the whitespaces selection is caused by VS Code? Anyway, I would for sure add cross tests with some edge cases as mentioned below.

I _believe_ the whitespace all on that single line is VS Code either adding another range or something. I witnessed a lot of odd stuff when testing with VS Code that I can't reproduce when using coc-metals.

 
![2021-06-10 17 11 18](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13974112/121550510-16286b80-ca0f-11eb-9bd5-95474e5d8f8a.gif)

Either way, I'll for sure add some cross tests.
I was afraid it was because of VS Code. They are probably trying to be smart and add another selection from the start of the line.
